name: Lostria
storyline: Lostria, an ancient world filled with magic and dominated by four races waging war for multiple reasons. The Humans empire trying to conquer the world with their newly developed magic-technology; The Epotykias kingdom fighting for their independence using elemental magic with their symbiotic relationship with spirits; The Quadris tribes and their extraordinary physical abilities fight to resist invaders from taking their lands; The Dragons, ancient creature able to adapt to any kind of environment and growth endlessly until their territory cover the world.
summary: Lostria is a competitive tactical game in a fantasy world. Compete against other players across the world in turn-based matches and collect characters to build you best team and climb the ladder.
